courses.title: Guitar Strumming Basics
courses.description: Master essential strumming patterns and chord transitions perfect for absolute beginners.

courses.title: Beginner Piano Chords
courses.description: Get started with fundamental chords and progressions every pianist must know.

courses.title: Vocal Power and Control
courses.description: Develop strong breath support and vocal tone for more expressive singing.

courses.title: Rhythm & Groove for Drummers
courses.description: Build solid grooves and timing with our complete drumming rhythm guide.

courses.title: Improvising Jazz Melodies
courses.description: Learn jazz phrasing, scales, and improvisation skills for live performance and composition.

courses.title: Intro to Digital Music Production
courses.description: Understand key concepts of DAWs, sound mixing, and production techniques.

courses.title: Crafting Memorable Songs
courses.description: Unlock your creativity with powerful techniques in songwriting structure and lyrics.

courses.title: EDM Track Creation
courses.description: From beats to basslines—learn to design and produce your first electronic music track.

courses.title: Mastering the Tabla Rhythms
courses.description: Dive into the art of Tabla playing—learn essential taal patterns, hand techniques, and rhythmic expression.

courses.title: Soulful Blues Violin
courses.description: Master expressive slides, vibrato, and phrasing to bring blues emotion to the violin.
